items.preText: Abhijato: "Sent in a prediction before the innings began predicting aggregate performance of Kiwi Top Three will be excellent. Let's see if the prediction comes true!"
items.text: full and angling in, driven straight to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Munro, no run

items.text: length outside off, too much width and Munro drills it through the covers, on the up and into the boundary in a flash
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Munro, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker, slight tail back in, Munro squeezes it out
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Munro, no run

items.text: short one, nice change up, hurried on to Munro, who ducks under eventually
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Munro, no run

items.text: slower ball, overpitched but Munro can't time or place the drive, goes straight to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Munro, no run

items.preText:
Shakib now

Danish Tanveer: "Forget about the crystal ball, New Zealand gonna win this match by 7 wickets and I'm looking forward to see England vs New Zealand in the final"
items.text: length and angled in, held in the surface, Guptill wanted to go over long-off but wasn't to the pitch, dragged it leg side where the long-on was in place, only had to come in a few paces and takes it comfortably. What a start for Shakib!
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Guptill, OUT

dismissal.text: MJ Guptill c Tamim Iqbal b Shakib Al Hasan 25 (22m 14b 3x4 1x6) SR: 178.57

items.text: Munro says no problem, comes down the wicket to a flatter delivery and hammers it over the bowler's head for six
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, SIX runs

items.text: shorter length, fired in on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: slower this time, Munro tries to turn it to the leg side, gets a slight leading edge, all along the ground towards point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, 1 run

items.text: slower, angled in, Williamson plants his front foot and can't get his bat around, he's struck on the front pad, there's a massive appeal turned down and Bangladesh review. But the replays confirm that the original decision was the right one with the ball shown to be sliding on with the arm and down the leg side. Bangladesh lose their review
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: length, angled in, Williamson tucks it away towards square leg for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.preText: In ODIs - Munro v Shakib: 34 runs off 21 balls, 0 dismissals; Guptill v Shakib: 42 off 55, 3 dismissals. It's clear who Shakib would rather bowl to
items.text: full on off and middle, Williamson comes forward and turns it through midwicket with the spin
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, not quite overpitched, Munro tries to blast it through the off side, gets a single down to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: length, flatter one on middle that has a bit of spin, Williamson uses it to turn it towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: full and angled in, Munro keeps the pad out of the way and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: shorter length on middle, Munro goes down on one knee and gets under it, picks it up to deep square leg's right for four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: short outside off, Williamson cuts it away straight to cover-point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on the pads, whipped away to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: arm bowl, angled across, Munro looks to play leg side again, gets a leading edge along the ground to short third-man
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: length on off, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: length on middle, stays back and pushes it to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, punched straight to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run
